title: Bug 124066 - Insert chart in context menu not translated into Chinese
description: In the context menu, the option to insert a chart is not translated into Chinese.
OB: When right-clicking in the layout to bring up the context menu, the expected behavior is for the option 'Insert chart' to be translated into Chinese.
EB: However, in the current state, the option 'Insert chart' is not translated into Chinese.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a report in a Chinese environment.
